page.title: 12NEWCOMERS-C.WALKER,M.DRAYCOT
page.content: MOST OF THE PEOPLE MOVED HERE BECAUSE OF THE COUNTRYSIDE,2 PEOPLE MOVED BECAUSE OF JOBS,AND ONE BOY MOVED FROM LONDON BECAUSE HIS MUM BOUGHT A SHOP.BEFORE HE LIVED IN LONDON HE LIVED IN MALAYA FOR 3 YEARS,HE THEN LIVED IN LONDON FOR 7 YEARS,SO HE WAS NOT USED TO OUR AREA BUT HE STILL LIKES THE PEOPLE THAT LIVE IN THE VILLAGE.HE HAS A BROTHER OF 7 AND A SISTER OF 2.HE SAID HE LIKES LONDON BETTER BECAUSE YOU CAN PLAY ANYWHERE. THE RECTOR'S SON LIVED IN NOTTINGHAM AND THEN MOVED TO WEST HALLAM AND HE LIKES THE AREA MORE THAN WHERE HE LIVED BEFORE BECAUSE THE GARDEN AND HOUSE ARE BIGGER AND THE SHOPS AND PLAYING AREAS ARE CLOSER THAN WHERE HE LIVED BEFORE.
